name: Tengfei Tou
story: Peng Le grew up in a small village in China's Anhui province. He joined the PLA as a marksman at the age of 18 and quickly rose through the ranks. He was eventually deployed to Takistan as part of a UN peacekeeping mission, where he gained a reputation as a deadly shot. After the mission ended, Peng Le joined a private military contractor and has since worked in conflicts around the world.
